update form set
fk_screen=#{fkScreen},
fk_user=#{fkUser},
seat_x=#{seatX},
seat_y=#{seatY},
code=#{code},
gmt_modified=#{gmtModified},
gmt_create=#{gmtCreate}
where pk_formid=#{pkFormid}
mapper.select: select pk_formid,fk_screen,fk_user,seat_x,seat_y,code, gmt_create,gmt_modified from form where pk_formid=#{pkFormid}
select pk_formid,fk_screen,fk_user,seat_x,seat_y,code, gmt_create,gmt_modified from form order by pk_formid limit #{page1},#{num}
select pk_formid,fk_screen,fk_user,seat_x,seat_y,code, gmt_create,gmt_modified from form where fk_user = #{userid}

select form.fk_screen as screenid, movie.movie_name as movieName, cinema.cinema_name as cinemaName, room.room_name as roomName, screen.begin_time as startTime, screen.end_time as endTime, screen.price as price, form.code as code, cinema.location as location, form.gmt_create as payTime from form,movie,cinema,room,screen where form.fk_screen = screen.pk_screenid and screen.fk_movie = movie.pk_movieid and screen.fk_room = room.pk_roomid and room.fk_cinema = cinema.pk_cinemaid and form.code = #{code} limit 1
select form.seat_x as x, form.seat_y as y from form where form.code = #{code}
